name: Vegan Gingerbread Cookies
description: These vegan gingerbread cookies are just perfect for the holiday season! They're festive, super easy to make, crispy on the outside, and soft on the inside. And aren't they insanely cute?
recipeIngredient: 1  flax egg ((1 tablespoon ground flaxseeds + 3 tablespoons water))

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the flax egg by combining the ground flaxseeds with water in a small bowl. Let it sit for about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the flax egg by combining the ground flaxseeds with water in a small bowl. Let it sit for about 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the dry ingredients. In another bowl combine the wet ingredients and the brown sugar including the flax egg.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the dry ingredients. In another bowl combine the wet ingredients and the brown sugar including the flax egg.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the dry and wet ingredients with a wooden spoon. Stir well. Then knead the dough with your hands.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the dry and wet ingredients with a wooden spoon. Stir well. Then knead the dough with your hands.

recipeInstructions.text: Form a ball and wrap it with plastic wrap. Store it in the fridge for about 1 1 /2 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Form a ball and wrap it with plastic wrap. Store it in the fridge for about 1 1 /2 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Use a rolling pin to roll out the dough. Cut out the gingerbread men with a cookie cutter. I used a smaller and a bigger one.
recipeInstructions.name: Use a rolling pin to roll out the dough. Cut out the gingerbread men with a cookie cutter. I used a smaller and a bigger one.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place the gingerbread men on top. Leave some space in between.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place the gingerbread men on top. Leave some space in between.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 10 minutes. Decorate with royal icing, sprinkles, and candy.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 10 minutes. Decorate with royal icing, sprinkles, and candy.
